title: Can you make a cover of a cover song? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sure, it is not different from a cover of an original song unless it is very much like the first cover. There are lot of covers on Youtube that use a specific style of a song that was a cover song when if became famous, e.g. Without You by Mariah Carey
Technically you always make a cover of the sheet music, each cover slightly unique.
